Smart Tape Dispenser: A tape dispenser that can detect the type of tape being used and dispense it accordingly. It can also detect when the tape is running low and notify the user to reorder.
Tape Dispenser with Built-in Scissors: A tape dispenser that comes with a built-in pair of scissors, making it easy to cut the tape to the desired length.
Tape Dispenser with Multiple Dispensers: A tape dispenser that has multiple dispensers for different types of tape, making it easy to switch between them.
Tape Dispenser with Digital Display: A tape dispenser that has a digital display that shows the amount of tape remaining, as well as the time and date.
Tape Dispenser with Reverse Function: A tape dispenser that has a reverse function, allowing the user to unwind the tape without having to manually pull it.
